nodes.text: The Master of the Theran Listeners was the senior Listener-Master and the unofficial leader of the Theran Listeners, a Force organization on the planet Nam Chorios. In 44 ABY, the Master of the Theran Listeners was Nenn. In that year, the dark side entity Abeloth arrived on Nam Chorios and took control of Nenn; however, when she tried to use Nenn's body to combat the Jedi Grand Master Luke Skywalker, Nenn committed suicide.
